pullRequest.title: DB-9434 ORDER BY can use the aliases defined in SELECT AS
pullRequest.bodyText:
e.g. as in
select C as C2+1 from A order by -C2;

nodes.bodyText:
As the comment says, this makes sure we disable access to alias for WHERE, HAVING and GROUP BY.
Currently, this is not supported. If we remove the line with clearAliases we can enable this. @yxia92 and i agreed on it might be safe currently to not change the behavior here.
